config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The configuration option 'skipUpscaling' is loaded from the preferences and set as selected or deselected in the user interface based on the value stored in the preferences.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The 'skipUpscaling' configuration is triggered whenever the preferences are loaded, which typically happens when the application starts or when the user accesses the settings related to image processing.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the 'skipUpscaling' configuration option is that it determines whether the upscaling algorithm should be skipped during image processing. If 'skipUpscaling' is selected, the upscaling algorithm will be bypassed, potentially leading to lower quality output images but faster processing. If 'skipUpscaling' is deselected, the upscaling algorithm will be applied, resulting in higher quality output images but slower processing.
